text:
clerk is to write the minutes, then the clerk must be trained and supervised. 
• Following the meeting, the minutes must be typed up (if required, support staff can help with the typing).  They 
must be checked and corrected by the meeting chairperson before distribution. 
• The chairperson has responsibility for distribution of the minutes, but support staff may help with the process. 
• Minutes must be distributed (usually by email) to all people on the attendance list within one week of the
